page.title: 13WOODLANDS
page.content: Woodlands started in 1980 . They employ 25 people fulltime and 10 partime .They grow over 500 different types of plants. At any one time they are growing over 1 million plants .The plants vary in price from as little as 15p to Â£125. They own another company called Midland Nursuries LTD which sells most of their plants .They sell to over 400 other companies from North of Aberdeen to South of Plymouth.They also sell to councils and local authorities.Spring is when they sell 60% of their plants. Many of their plants are grown in pots and people plant them when new shoots start to appear, when the weather improves. Propagation is from cuttings which are rooted and cared for in a special glass house.
